title: His Dark Materials Trilogy: The Golden Compass / The Subtle Knife / The Amber Spyglass
description: This is Philip Pullman's classic trilogy in one slipcase. Since the first volume was published in 1995, and has now been filmed as "The Golden Compass", the trilogy has been acclaimed as a modern masterpiece, and has won the UK's top awards for children's literature. Today, the fabulous story of Lyra and her daemon is read and loved by adults and children alike.
author: Philip Pullman
